description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bqsm1","text":"Gene expression analysis is a molecular biology approach that allows, among other things, to evaluate the differential expression of genes involved in the development of a certain disease and to identify possible therapeutic targets. The lung is a complex organ composed of more than 52 different cell types, which makes it necessary to implement cutting-edge technologies such as single cell RNA seq analysis for its study. This approach allows to identify genes potentially associated with the development and/or progression of age-related diseases as the idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, and to identify genes associated with the senescence process and to correlate their expression in certain cell types and their involvement in those diseases. This protocol allows the dissociation of a human lung specimen to a cell suspension and the generation of single cell 3´gene expression dual index libraries from single cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7q8m5","text":"Soak the lung pieces in PBS (3x) to remove red blood cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9f9i4","text":"Compress with a sterile gauze pad to remove excess liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5vkah","text":"Carefully remove the parietal pleura.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"664m1","text":"Dissect the tissue into 1-cm3 pieces and transfer to a 50 ml conical tube (15 g of tissue without pleura per tube) containing the enzyme cocktail (1 mg/ml liberase DL, DNase I, DMEM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4kcqi","text":"Allow the sample to digest for 2 hours at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"beb4f","text":"Inactive the digestion buffer (collagenolytic and proteolytic activity) with 2 ml of cold FBS and leave the sample on ice for 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9rthq","text":"Serially filter the suspension through 300-μm, 100-μm, 70-μm and strainers. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fk3er","text":"After straining, centrifuge 500g for 7 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bpal3","text":"Remove supernatant, add 1x RBC lysis to pellet, re-suspend pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bh5iv","text":"Incubate in 4 degree C fridge for 7 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"59keu","text":"Add PBS (10% FBS), centrifuge 500g for 7 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dbffj","text":"Remove supernatant, re-suspend pellet in 10ml PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjrv2","text":"Filter through 40-μm strainer one more time to remove clumped, dead cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63kjb","text":"Count cells and viability using countess automatic cell counter, confirm reading under themicroscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blv3h","text":"Prepare a vial with a cell stock concentration of 1000 cells/ul and keep on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"89qq1","text":"Proceed to the GEM generation and barcoding step","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9sof2","text":"Add 31.9 µl Master Mix into each tube of a PCR 8-tube strip on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8im2l","text":"Assemble Chromium Next GEM Chip G:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"abfcu","text":"After removing the chip from the sealed bag, use the chip in ≤ 24 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ccj4l","text":"Align notch on the chip (upper left corner) and the holder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kdtv","text":"Insert the left-hand side of the chip under the guide. Depress the righthand side of the chip until the spring-loaded clip engages.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9akud","text":"Close the lid before dispensing reagents into the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7njae","text":"Load Chromium NextGEM Chip G:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12bv8","text":"a)Add 50% glycerol solution to each unused well (if processing \u003c8 samples/chip).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe3d7","text":"    i)70 µl in each unused well in row labeled 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16abq","text":"    ii)50 µl in each unused well in row labeled 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bl1i0","text":"    iii)45 µl in each unused well in row labeled 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"esbe9","text":"Prepare Master Mix + Cell suspension:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"okh8","text":"Refer to the Cell Suspension Volume Calculator Table","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmhi","text":"Add the appropriate volume of nuclease-free water to Master Mix. Pipette mix 5x. Add corresponding volume of single cell suspension to Master Mix. Total of 75 µl in each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"foan0","text":"Gently pipette mix the cell suspension before adding to the Master Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2fe4u","text":"Load Row Labeled 1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"82qil","text":"Gently pipette mix the Master Mix + Cell Suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1j343","text":"Using the same pipette tip, dispense 70 µl Master Mix + Cell Suspension into the bottom center of each well in row labeled 1 without introducing bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5vq8o","text":"Prepare Gel Beads:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ev3g1","text":"Snap the tube strip holder with the Gel Bead strip into a 10x Vortex Adapter. Vortex 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9b5jr","text":"Centrifuge the Gel Bead strip for ~5 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jgc6","text":"Confirm there are no bubbles at the bottom of the tubes and the liquid levels are even.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c60rt","text":"Place the Gel Bead strip back in the holder. Secure the holder lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ekb62","text":"Load Row Labeled 2:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9b94e","text":"Puncture the foil seal of the Gel Bead tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7k2kq","text":"Slowly aspirate 50 µl Gel Beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jlec","text":"Dispense into the wells in row labeled 2 without introducing bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2r09a","text":"Load Row Labeled 3:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5us8p","text":"Dispense 45 µl Partitioning Oil into the wells in row labeled 3 from a reagent reservoir.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6oatj","text":"Attach GEM Gasket","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"69rei","text":"Collect 15 to 30 g of lung tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"46p9l","text":"Run the Chromium Controller:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3tupe","text":"Press the eject button on the Controller to eject the tray.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"220mi","text":"Place the assembled chip with the gasket in the tray, ensuring that the chip stays horizontal. Press the button to retract the tray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tnqt","text":"Confirm the Chromium Chip G program on screen. Press the play button.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ag8gt","text":"At completion of the run (~18 min), the Controller will chime. Immediately proceed to the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dlgp5","text":"Transfer GEMs:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ic9v","text":"Place a tube strip on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6uh0u","text":"Press the eject button of the Controller.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1138k","text":"Discard the gasket. Open the chip holder. Fold the lid back until it clicks to expose the wells at 45 degrees.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dknof","text":"Slowly aspirate 100 µl GEMs from the lowest points of the recovery wells in the top row labeled 3 without creating a seal between the tips and the bottom of the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o9hi","text":"Over the course of ~20 sec, dispense GEMs into the tube strip on ice with the pipette tips against the sidewalls of the tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"642o1","text":"Add 300 µl 80% ethanol to the pellet while on the magnet. Wait 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bvnr7","text":"Remove the ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"25uto","text":"Add 200 µl 80% ethanol to pellet. Wait 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ur97","text":"Remove from the magnet. Immediately add 35.5 µl Elution Solution I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agqir","text":"Place on the magnet•Low until the solution clears","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7hv40","text":"Transfer 35 µl sample to a new tube strip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eou58","text":"Pipette mix 15x (pipette set to 90 µl). Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7n5q","text":"Add 200 µl 80% ethanol to the pellet. Wait 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
